title: Chhandamtun min hruai zel a
lyrics:
Chhandamtu'n min hruai zel a,
Tuipui fawn hlauhawmah pawh,
Hriat loh fawn vel karah pawh,
Himna lungpui nghet a ni;
Min hruaina mak tak mai chuan,
Chhandamtu'n min hruai zel a.

Chunnu hrai chawi mu angin,
Tuipui hlauhawm a reh a;
Tuifawnten a thu an awih,
'Bang rawh u,' tih a sawi chu;
Tuipui chunga thuneitu,
Chhandamtu'n min hruai zel a.

Thihna luipui kamah chuan,
Hlauhnaten min tuam mah se,
Muang takin ka chawl ang a;
I angchhung muannaah chuan,
I aw nemin min hrilh la,
'Hlau suh ka hruai zel ang che.'
